name: Lift
overview: Another cute mini game from Japanese dev Inufuto released on 12.29.2021! This game may look simple to the eye, but it's extremely addictive and fun! It's a bit of a mash-up between a puzzler version of Elevator Action and Capture the Flag! To maximize scoring, pick up consecutive color flags! Inufutu posts all of his games on approximately 27 different retro computer formats.
